name: Rocket Runner (Robster95)
description:
Rocket Runner is a small hyper-casual mobile game that I created in two weeks.

The goal is simple. Use W,A,S,D  to move the rocket and dodge obstacles in your way. Fly as far as you can and collect as many coins as possible to unlock different rockets.

There are two versions in this post:

The first version is the Browser version that does not have a save feature.

The Second version is a Windows, Mac and Linux version that has a save feature.

This game will also be available on mobile in the future!

See how far you can get and have fun!

Version 0.1.1 Update:

-Fixed bug where the game will randomly freeze after spawning more parts of the world

-Limited the max obstacles to 3

-Lowered the speed value for the world progression to allow the player to last longer per playthrough
